resources.string: Show All (Warning, can be very slow!)
Author: John Hudson.\nPlease send any questions, comments or suggestions to johhud1@gmail.com

Welcome to Passive Location Monitor. This is the map view, where location \ requests are marked by their geographic position. Each location request is placed on the map as its own marker, unless there were several requests nearby in a small time-frame, in which case the requests are merged into one marker, and the number of merged \ requests is noted in the marker callout

This is the time graph view. The number of requests per hour is graphed here. \ Its likely there are no requests recorded yet, so this screen will be blank. Once there are, you can select \ a time range to display in the map view by clicking on the graph or dragging the dark squares.
Not enough Location Requests have been made yet, nothing to graph
